title: Dynamics of Elastic Wires: Preserving Area without Nonlocality
abstract:
We derive a gradient flow of the elastic energy which preserves the enclosed
area of evolving planar curves. Contrary to an earlier approach, we give
priority to locality, resulting in a sixth order evolution equation. For this
new area preserving flow, we prove a global existence result. Additionally, by
penalizing the length, we show convergence to an area constrained critical
point of the elastic energy.
